# Supplementary Material

This thesis is available in Rmarkdown format as GitHub repository at https://github.com/makipp/thesis.

Code for the project is available as a GitHub respository at https://github.com/makipp/TourrGuiD3. To run the app you will need the latest version of R and RStudio.

To run the app:

1. Visit the GitHub page, select "Download ZIP" under the green "Clone or Download button
2. Save and extract the ZIP file to a location on your computer
3. Ensure you have the following R packages installed via the `install.packages()` command:
    * `shiny`
    * `ggvis`
    * `tidyverse`
    * `tourr`
    * `jsonlite`
4. Open the `ui.R` file in RStudio and click on the "Run App" play button at the top-right hand corner of the code window to launch the app. 
There are also other ways of loading shiny apps, for example https://shiny.rstudio.com/articles/app-formats.html and https://shiny.rstudio.com/articles/running.html
